articles.author: David Snelling
articles.title: Own a Galaxy S10 or S20? Samsung's Android 11 update is coming soon and here's what's new - Daily Express
articles.description: SAMSUNG has now confirmed that its Android 11 One UI 3.0 update is launching soon and here are all of the new features coming to phones such as the Galaxy S20 and Galaxy S10.
